subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Although Levi Leipheimer came in second at the finish line on Wednesday, he retained the overall lead by three seconds over Jens Voigt, a German rider for CSC.
snippet: Although Levi Leipheimer came in second at the finish line on Wednesday, he retained the overall lead by three seconds over Jens Voigt, a German rider for CSC.
